item.description:
In this meetup, you will have the opportunity to learn about energetic healing, Native American style!  You will learn at least one technique and also have an opportunity to receive a healing. 

We have 125 members of this meetup group, and I would love to see more of you!  Our meetups are attended by those who are not meetup members (those who attend the regular classes here and who have received services in the past often attend). 

Please bring enough food to share with four other people, and be ready for good conversation and great company with like minded people. 

Just an advance notice of next month's meetup:  it will be a family day with activities to develop your intuition as well as your child's!

Come and see what we are all about!  Please write if you have any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: come up to the upper porch and walk right in!
item.name: Healing... what is it?
